attributes.action: Increase the number of speed cameras on our roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speeding is dangerous and an offence. This will only be reduced if irresponsible motorists believe they will be caught and prosecuted.
All signs warning of speed cameras should be removed though the speed limit should be clearly signed.
All cameras should be hidden to reduce the danger of motorists braking sharply when they spot a camera.
Motorists should know that if they speed they will be prosecuted.
This is NOT a tax, this is a criminal penalty for anti social behaviour.
